info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 10:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Gusty winds and brief heavy rain will impact portions of Liberty, northwestern Fergus, southern Blaine, southern Hill and Chouteau Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1056 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and some embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of The Knees to 8 miles southwest of Winifred. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havre, Fort Benton, Chester, Big Sandy, Geraldine, Denton, Winifred, Parker School, Beaver Creek, Joplin, The Knees, Azure, Inverness, Agency, St. Pierre, Gildford, Sangrey, Boneau, Fort Belknap and Box Elder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Localized heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
